transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello, yes ma'am.
Customer: Rahul bol
Executive: Yes ma'am, aapka call aaya tha abhi.
Customer: Haan ji haan ji, hi Rahul, main Harleen bol rahi thi, Lengers Healthcare Global Healthcare se. Abhi aapki Mr. Manoj se baat hui hogi na?
Executive: Yes ma'am, abhi baat hui thi.
Customer: Haan ji haan ji. To I just raised a concern, mere ko na IndiaMART ki banner ads run karni thi. Scrolling ads ya banner ads, what all options you have ispe ads run karne ke liye?
Executive: Banners add karna hai?
Customer: Nahi nahi, ads run karni hai.
Executive: Uh, just one minute.
Customer: IndiaMART pe aap apne product ki ads run kar sakte ho na ki kahin aap logon ko pop-up dikhe ya koi scrolling karta hua text dikhe.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Yes ma'am, bataiye.
Customer: Haan, mere ko IndiaMART pe apne product ki add run karni hai to uske bare mein jaanna tha.
Executive: Okay. Uh, matlab jo add runs hote hain na ya phir jo bhi aap dekhte hain jo bhi page pe na, uske liye na mujhe phir batana padega, uske liye particular hamare na packages hote hain. Agar usko add runs karna hai, theek hai? To uske liye wo cheeze hain. To agar aap video meeting ka time de to phir hum aapko thoda sa better way pe show kar payenge. Aur mujhe check karna padega ki us categories mein particular jaise aapne dekha hoga hamari dir.indiamart mein dikha hoga, wahan pe kai sare at least brand oriented hote hain na jo wahan pe dikhta hai, banners dikhte hain.
Customer: Haan haan haan haan.
Executive: Usi ki baat kar rahe hain na aap?
Customer: Correct, correct. Ya jaise kisi ne hamare type ka product search kiya to usko ek wo square ke andar photo aur hamara product dikh jata hai ya phir niche scrolling mein. Humne pehle bhi ek baar aapse run kari thi ads. But ab actually koi aur dekh raha tha marketing to ab main thoda naya naya aayi hoon to mujhe idea nahi hai.
Executive: Lengers Global mein kara tha aapne ya phir ek aur aapki jo company hai usne kara tha?
Customer: Global mein bhi kiya tha.
Executive: Global pe to yahan pe koi aisa run related koi bhi aisa hamari sath website nahi chali hai.
Customer: Nahi hai phir phir Lengers ke through kiya hoga.
Executive: Uh, to matlab particular na isme na categories wise products hote hain hamare run hote hain. Ab suppose jaise ki EMG machine ispe search karu to EMG machines pe agar main baat karu to
Customer: Nahi nahi, mere ko Holter uspe laser machine pe chalana hai add. Holium laser machine pe.
Executive: Holium laser.
(silence)
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Holium laser machine pe na?
Customer: Haan ji haan ji.
Executive: Dekhiye, basically kya hai na, uh, hamare paas na, uh, around two to three type ke products hote hain, theek hai? Like abhi jo hamari services chal rahi hai na, base services chal rahi hai, like basic services aapki jo listing aati hai, theek hai? Wo jaise ki jahan ki GST hoti hai aur nearby ye aati hai wahan pe. Aapko wahan se hum kya usme buyleads dete hain. Particular hamare paas do type ke product hote hain to listing based product hote hain like suppose koi search karta hai Delhi, Mumbai, Gujarat to aapki wahan pe listing aati hai, theek hai?
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: To usko bolte hain star and leader. Aapne dekha hoga hamare kai sare supplier hain jo usme dikh raha hoga aapko EMG pe dekha hoga ya holium pe aur bhi other dekha hoga. Kahin pe star leader ka tag dikhta hai.
Customer: Correct, haan ji.
Executive: Theek hai? Jaise ki aapki Lengers ke alawa jo aapki dusri wali jo company hai na usme leader already chal raha hai.
Customer: Haan haan haan haan.
Executive: Theek hai? But is Lengers Global Healthcare mein bilkul basic services chal rahi hain. To uske liye kya hota hai na ki basically wo add jo aap bol rahe hain na jaise ki aap log wo SEO karate hain wo basically hum log internal SEO karte hain wo packages defined hote hain.
Customer: Theek hai. To jaise agar next package lena ho to iska next package phir kaun sa aata hai?
Executive: Next hota hai hamare paas listing based product hota hai jaise ki suppose aap usme particular category based choose kar sakte hain ki is category mein mujhe chahiye all India ke liye ya is category mein mujhe chahiye 10 city ke liye. Is type se product defined hai hamare. To agar aap video meeting ka time de to main ek one by one aapko thoda dikha do, share kar do ki kya cheeze hain.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Kyunki abhi aap check karte honge to holium laser pe na kahin kahin listing hamari nahi aati hai. To usme kya hoga particular aap all India koi search karega holium laser suppliers and manufacturers machine to Lengers Global as a leader supplier wahan pe leading supplier ka tag bhi dikhta hai.
Customer: Theek hai, theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai? Wo particular hum add wala bhi product hota hai to but ek one by one agar hum batayenge to aapko better hoga. To thoda sa agar video meeting ka time de to hum aapko thoda sa better way mein presentation de payenge.
Customer: Okay. Uh, to kya hum ye parson ka rakh sakte hain?
Executive: Uh, okay, theek hai.
Customer: Parson aapko WhatsApp, acha inka jo aapka jo call aaya tha I think isi regarding aaya tha.
Customer: Correct, correct, haan ji haan ji.
Executive: Theek hai. Maine waise Abhishek ji aapke yahan hai, aapke yahan Abhishek ji se hamari baat hoti hai. Theek hai? To maine kai baar approach kiya tha uske regarding ki hum aur city basis pe kar paye kyunki humne bahut sara ispe kaam kiya tha to already aapne dekha hoga ki kitna sara inquiries ka flow badha hai.
Customer: Bilkul ji bilkul bilkul.
Executive: Theek hai? Around hamari abhi na IndiaMART ko na. Haan, haan wo badh jayega call flow kyunki hamari abhi na base services chal rahi hain usme se aap kai sari services hamari hoti hain like star hota hai, leader hota hai. Hamare paas particular aur bhi sare products hain, theek hai? Jo particular aapko city based promotion hi dete hain. Wahan us city se koi search karega holium to aapko wahan pe listing dikhti hai.
Customer: Theek hai. Nahi to koi jo bhi basic aapka best plan hoga I want to go to that. To hum parson ka ek call rakh lete hain video call for around 10 a.m.
Executive: Okay, parson na, Thursday.
Customer: Haan ji, Thursday ko.
Executive: Hmm, theek hai, kal off bhi off bhi hai hamara. Agar aaj aaj bhi rakhna chahe to rakh sakte hain aap ab aap aa jaye aur aapke koi aur bhi jaise jo seniors Mukesh Sharma sir se meri Manoj hai na hamare yahan jo aapke yahan. To Manoj sir se bhi bahut kam connect ho pata hai. To ek baar agar sath mein le lenge to better hoga. Phir samne hum aapko bata denge kya cheeze hain, kaise kya aur cheeze kar sakte hain.
Customer: Theek hai, main aise karti hoon isi number pe ek baar connect kar leti hoon agar 3 p.m. ka possible hai, main ek baar aapko. Aap ye I think aapne customer care pe kiya hai ya phir?
Customer: Abhi to maine Rahul ke number se kiya hai.
Executive: Acha wahan pe aapne dekha hoga Rahul ka. Haan haan, ya aap apna number de dijiye I'll directly connect with you.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm. Theek hai, theek hai. Hum abhi main Rahul ko bol deta hoon to ek baar wo connect kar lenge. Aap apna personal number de dijiye ek baar hum ek message kar dete hain aapko Rahul aur main aur ek group bana dete hain to usme aap message kar dijiyega jab bhi available time hoga na to aap bata dijiyega.
Customer: Theek hai ji, theek hai. Can you connect, like write my number please?
Executive: Haan, yes.
Customer: 98
Executive: 98
Customer: 558
Executive: 558
Customer: 00
Executive: 00
Customer: 674
Executive: 674. Theek hai. 9898989855800674.
Customer: Correct, haan ji.
Executive: Yeah, good name?
Customer: Harleen.
Executive: Harneer? Harleen, H A R L double E N, Harleen Sharma.
Executive: Okay, okay. Theek hai. To na hum ek baar meeting fix kar lete hain, theek hai? Ek baar hum connect kar lenge aapko Thursday, theek hai? Uh, aap agar hai agar aaj ka 3 p.m. ka let me just check my time slot ki agar. Ek baar time slot check kar lijiye hum waise 9 to 6 hain available to aaj agar aaj hi ho payega to aur better ho payega.
Customer: Theek hai. To agar 3 baje ka rakh sakte honge phir main abhi aapko ek baar connect call back ya aap mere ko message drop kar do main uske. Haan, main abhi message drop kar de raha hoon.
Customer: Haan, theek hai. Aapka kyunki ye 9696 pe aaya tha aapka, theek hai? To main aapko WhatsApp pe kar deta hoon. Rahul ka bhi number de raha hoon. Main unka senior hoon. To main aapko dal deta hoon number to aap directly kar sakte hain call, theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai ji, theek hai right. Thank you.
Executive: Theek hai. To aapka ek ye complaint bhi generate ho jata hai yahan pe matlab aap jab bhi koi bhi call karte hain customer care mein to ek complaints type ka ho jata hai to main abhi wo close kar sakta hoon, theek hai? Aap, theek hai ab aap direct kar sakte hain humse connect koi dikkat nahi. Agar Abhishek ji se aap approach karte hain to mil jata number unke yahan se connect hota rehta hai hamara.
Customer: Okay okay okay okay.
Executive: Ho gaya, theek hai. Okay. Alright, thank you, thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to run banner ads on IndiaMART.

- Wants to know about ad options.



Resolution:

- Executive explained ad packages.

- Suggested a video meeting for better understanding.

- Will share details and connect with Rahul.



Next Steps: 

- Video meeting scheduled for Thursday or today.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- ads, banner, video meeting, packages
